name: A Type Of Rhythm
description:
You love rhythm games. Maybe you played a typing game once.

But have you experienced both at the same time?
With A Type Of Rhythm, you don't just have to type the words correctly - you
also need to type them to the beat!

With five songs and hundreds of words, what will your best scores be?

Made for Ludum Dare 41 - Combine 2 Incompatible Genres
